about_the_game:
is a top down Adventure game with story driven RPG elements, point & click interaction and world exploration.



The story unfolds as you try to escape from a mysterious facility and its unusual occupants. Along the way you discover a dystopian dark era of human progress. Form a connection with your inner personalities and their intrusive thoughts and suggestions. Confront different characters and unravel the secrets of a futuristic human society and your place in it.



THE STORY

In the beginning, darkness envelops you. Uncertain whether you're dreaming or awake, the only company you find comes from a voice echoing in your mind. Time becomes a blur—minutes melding into hours—until finally, a glimmer of light graces your eyes.

Emerging in an unknow area you decide to move. Your path meanders through eerie corridors and chambers adorned with machines of unknown purpose. Gradually, you uncover traces of a dystopian human society shaped by AI machines.

Amidst this labyrinth of deceit, malevolent programs run rampant, corrupting the very fabric of artificial intelligence and plunging society into a nightmarish dystopia.



ATTRIBUTES

Select between the following attributes to tailor your playthrough style.

Morphology – everything around you, including yourself, comes from using force on the perceived reality. Master this skill to best bend your surroundings to your liking.

Cybernity – the ability to see the world as a deterministic whole, following logical laws. React to situations with calculated precision and rationality.

Dynamism – the speed and agility with which you react to external impulses. It is easier to wonder into strange places knowing you are hard to be caught off-guard.

Ánthrōpos – the art of being human. Tap into the unique perspective that can only be given from a being possessing a conscience and a lure of becoming.

Mind set

Gather tools and skills to gain physical access to the mechanical and biological parts of your constructed head, enabling you to shape yourself through direct manipulation of your electrical circuits. Choose to which personality-shaping algorithms you will give precedence, thus making companions on your journey right out of your own mind.



DEVELOPMENT:

We have released a demo, with an Introductory part of the game and story elements showing off the main game mechanics. The Untethered Void is still in development.

name: The Untethered Void

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 640 (2048 VRAM) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: What if artificial intelligence is not evolution incarnate and humanity is left with only Pain as an evolutionary driver. The Untethered Void is a Adventure game in a future world where to be asked to be cured of your fundamental despair, is to ask to be cured of what little self you may have.
